svg.class: lucide lucide-bell size-12 stroke-white group-hover:stroke-[#FDC145] transition-all duration-300
svg.style: fill: none; height: 48px; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px; transition-duration: 0.3s; transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1); visibility: visible; width: 48px

path.style: fill: none; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px; transform-origin: 0px 0px; visibility: visible
fill: none; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px; transform-origin: 0px 0px; visibility: visible
